Sentencas: Long-lasting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) rely upon an intact ionically conducting network in both the electrolyte and electrode.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Understanding the impact of the high-temperature electrochemical operations on the possible nanostructure evolutions of ionic conductors is indispensable for the development of durable SOFC.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here we present possibly the first experimental evidence of space charge layer evolution of grain boundaries (GBs) of ionic conducting yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) in a Ni/YSZ composite anode of SOFCs.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cells with identical Ni/YSZ composite anodes are either thermally treated or electrochemically operated using either dry or humidified H 2 fuel for up to 3,349 h. When operating under humidified H 2 fuel, a discrete core-shell structure is found to develop exclusively along the YSZ/YSZ GB planes.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The core-shell structure is elliptically shaped elongated along the GB planes.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The core has a lower mass with a Y-depleted ZrO 2-x with a cubic structure.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The shell has a constant thickness of similar to 1 nm and is Y-enriched.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The nucleation and growth mechanisms of the core-shell structure are proposed in terms of the space charge layer evolution at YSZ GBs.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of the humidity in the fuel, the cell operating temperatures, and the current density on the formation of the core-shell structure is investigated.(c) 2022 Acta Materialia Inc.
Titulo: Space charge layer evolution at yttria-stabilized zirconia grain boundaries upon operation of solid oxide fuel cells
